name: simple ball game (po-ly)
description:
a simple ball game!

This game is a very simple game, a very simple ball game at that. It was designed to use as many addictive tactics that mobile game developers that I could fit into such a simple game that has no online functionality. Here is the list of said tactics:

  • continue with ads (yes, there are ads, but they are the default Unity test ads so I don't really make any money)
  • highscores (people like it when numbers go up, and they really like it when numbers go higher than their previous number!)
  • collectables (a shop with skins! people like collecting things so therefore they will spend more time to get said collectables)
  • scaling gameplay (people will more likely continue because they know that the beginning of the game is slower than the later parts, where you can get more score and coins)

This game is not really well optimized (it reads a file ~500times/s), nor very well coded, but it was made mostly as a proof of example to show that these tactics do not take long to implement in such a small game, and there are multiple at play in such simple gameplay (but still took me way too long as this is the first Unity game I've ever made).

how to play: 

tap the screen to flip the paddle, the color that is facing up should be the same as the falling ball. if you do that, you're good!
